name: A Gallon of Retail
description:
A Gallon of Retail is a game where you manage a store in the middle of serbia. You have to buy products and use the help of your news page-fetching AI to see what the big event is tomorrow. Theres also an infinite mode. Y'know, if you want to just... Play..

This game was made for the Wowie 4.0 Game Jam, with the theme "Collaborate with AI". All of your customers are AI controlled, and want products. You have to collaborate with their needs, selling the products they want. You also have a virtual assistant AI on your desktop who fetches you news articles of what special event happens tommorow.

CONTROLS
  • WASD or Arrows to move.
  • Use SPACE or E to interact.
  • Backspace or ESC to open menu
NOTES
  • The main campaign gets harder after day 2.
  • Infinite Mode gets harder over time, eg: customers will want car parts and frozen goods more often.
  • If you try to do the cashier minigame, press e and it doesnt show up, try exiting the counter and re-entering.
  • If an NPC gets stuck on the cashier desk, just wait a bit, they will leave eventually.
CREDITS

This was a solo project by Silenceman!
